title: "Deep-learning-based anatomical landmark identification in CT scans"
excerpt: "When planning orthodontic treatments using computed tomography images, surgeons often need to identify points of interest in the bones called “anatomical landmarks,” which help them diagnose conditions and make precise measurements."
